con:restRequest.name: PurchaseTransaction
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": "6300.26", "ShippingAndHandling": "0", "TransactionTotalTax": "10", "TransactionNumber": "Tran_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2017 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "3/2/2022 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionEndDateTime": "3/2/2024 12:00:00 AM", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "ProgramCode":"PP", "GrossAmount": "6310.25", "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": "5", "DollarValueGross": "6300.26", "DollarValueNet": "6310.25", "ItemNumber": "SKU-00069", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": "1", "LineNumber": 1, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "PR", } ], "Tenders": [ { "TenderCode": "CASH", "TenderAmount": "50" } ]
} }
